name: Only One Pixel Hero!
description:
A minimalist action adventure game, with a whole world to discover! A world that is only 192 pixels square.

My goal for this entry was to explore the limits that such a minimalism imposes.

My apologies to color blind people.

Last Upload is a bit late, Itch.io was down and I got discouraged. I realised my entry was still valid thanks to Mark Brown's understanding of the situation so I uploaded it late. Meanwhile, I didn't add anything to the game but I did debug some minor issues.
